ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A very good weekend!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That is annoying, aye. ... I ve heard a lot of paladins complain about how weak their taunt is. I have a (Very low) paladin. But do not know firsthand
ygData.messageBody:
>also I would attack with my dragoon dirk. Our tank was a level 9 Paladin
>who was kind of irritating because he seemed to accidentally loot out
>of turn a lot..:P

That is annoying, aye.

>Anyway I dont know if it was his lousy taunt or if bard songs ultra aggro
>mobs.

I've heard a lot of paladins complain about how weak their taunt is.
I have a (Very low) paladin. But do not know firsthand about this yet.
I also am not sure if that weak taunt comes from the cap not being
as high as other classes (which means that it would only affect things
at high levels) or if it actually is less effective all the way up.
But I try to remember, when grouped with a paladin that doesn't seem
to be taunting, that this is a common complaint of paladins both on
the Paladins of Norrath board, and in game. And give them the benefit
of the doubt on this issue (at least until I get my paladin up to the level
I can determine for myself...)

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 15 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Freeport)
